title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 on integrating ethics into the NLP curriculum
<|assistant|>

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 on integrating ethics into the Natural Language Processing (NLP) curriculum. These articles cover various aspects of ethical considerations in NLP research, development, and application
Ethical Considerations in NLP Research
This article discusses the ethical implications of NLP research, including issues related to bias, privacy, and transparency
NLP and Ethics: A Review of the Literature
This article provides a comprehensive review of the ethical issues surrounding NLP research and development
